concepts.PA,_WAS_MEDICATION_FOR_BREAKTHROUGH_PAIN: Was medication for breakthrough pain taken?
concepts.PA,_RESPONSE_TO_MEDICATION_26_DESC: This score measures the level of pain after administration of medication for breakthrough pain
concepts.PA,_ALGOPLUS_PAIN_ASSESSMENT_33_DESC: Facial expression (frowning, grimacing, wincing, clenched tetther, inexpression), Look (inattentive, blank stare, distant or imploring, tear-eyed, closed eyes),  Complaints ('ow-ouch', 'that' hurts', groaning, screaming), Body position (withdrawn, guarded, refuses to move, frozen posture), Atypical behaviour (agitation, aggressivity, grabbing onto something or someone)
concepts.PA,_PAIN_COURSE_13_DESC: Background pain is persistent, breakthrough pain is intermittent.
concepts.PA,_PRESUMED_CAUSE_11_DESC: if relevant: e.g. surgical wound, CIPN, tumour involvement
